channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8393] Handle SIGINT on Tez
item.description: The signal handler in hive currently only interrupts MR jobs. The same logic can be used to interrupt Tez dags as well.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: +1 LGTM pending tests. +1 for 0.14 as well.

Overall: -1 no tests executed
